divs: Sighting DetailsI was on route to food store,the traffic was very light,I saw a flash of light in sky about mile and a half away,about 700 feet up.The object looked like it was coming down,could not see any tail as in a jet,nor wings of any.It was light breezy,no clouds near by,could not hear sound of it for the occational car passing by,birds singing ect...The object moved rapidly,faster then any jet or prop plane would in a landing formation.The object appeared to look like a silvery rope with elongated eggs,one in middle the other at the near end.It seem to be turning from antelope road to watt avenue,that is near Mc Clellan Air Force Bace.I saw no smoke or the trail there of,I saw no wings nor tail of such jet ect... The object was moving rather fast at a steep decline and sort of blended in to the sky.... well.The object looked long,perhaps 450 feet long to as long as 720 ft long.The time I saw this object was at 10:40 this morning in sacramento,California for about 22 seconds long.I was surprised at the speed it was traveling,no sonic boom,no roaring of a jet or prop engin.It looked in likeness of a centepeed,with a rope or braeded body.
Summary: silvery--rope with two elongated silver egg shapes,in middle and at the end
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were no other sightings in Sacramento on or around February 15th 2010
